name: Flying Pig: Change color to get higher
name_original: Flying Pig: Change color to get higher
description:
Use your brain and raise the Flying Pig as high as possible!

Flying Pig - is a fun mix of arcade and puzzle.

Change color to win neighboring tiles and open the way to the top.
Capture tiles with numbers to refill moves.
Choose the optimal path for the pig!

Compete with other players in Game Center!
